materials.raw_text:
Gallium (Ge): 12.5 g 
 Manganese (Mn): 75 g 
 Scandium (Sc): 50 g

Scandium is available through specialized metal suppliers. Silicon can be sourced from electronics suppliers. Zirconium can be found through metal distributors or chemical suppliers.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Wear appropriate safety gear including gloves and goggles. 
 2. Weigh out each ingredient using a precision balance. 
 3. In a clean, dry container, add 12.5 g of Gallium (Ge). 
 4. Slowly add 75 g of Manganese (Mn) while stirring continuously. 
 5. Add 50 g of Scandium (Sc) and mix thoroughly until uniform. 
 6. Incorporate 110 g of Silicon (Si) into the mixture, ensuring even distribution. 
 7. Finally, add 10 g of Zirconium (Zr) and mix until all components are well blended.
